org.jasig.cas.monitor

Class MemcachedMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.monitor.AbstractNamedMonitor<CacheStatus>
      • org.jasig.cas.monitor.AbstractCacheMonitor
        • org.jasig.cas.monitor.MemcachedMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Monitor<CacheStatus>

    @Component(value="memcachedMonitor")
public class MemcachedMonitor
extends AbstractCacheMonitor
    Monitors the memcached hosts known to an instance of MemcachedClientIF.
    Since:
    3.5.1

      • Fields inherited from class org.jasig.cas.monitor.AbstractCacheMonitor

    • Method Detail

      • observe

        public CacheStatus observe()
        Supersede the default cache status algorithm by considering unavailable memcached nodes above cache statistics. If all nodes are unavailable, raise an error; if one or more nodes are unavailable, raise a warning; otherwise delegate to examination of cache statistics.
        Specified by:
        observe in interface Monitor<CacheStatus>
        Overrides:
        observe in class AbstractCacheMonitor
        Returns:
        Cache status descriptor.

      • getStatistics

        protected CacheStatistics[] getStatistics()
        Get cache statistics for all memcached hosts known to MemcachedClientIF.
        Specified by:
        getStatistics in class AbstractCacheMonitor
        Returns:
        Statistics for all available hosts.
